snippet: The aircraft, flying within the country to Makassar from Masamba, was carrying 10 people when it disappeared from radar within minutes after taking off.
abstract: Indonesian officials plan aerial search for small Aviastar passenger plane, with 10 aboard, that disappeared from radar 11 minutes after lifting off from Masamba, South Sulawesi Province.
lead_paragraph: The aircraft, flying within the country to Makassar from Masamba, was carrying 10 people when it disappeared from radar within minutes after taking off.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Indonesia: A Plane Carrying 10 People Disappears
headline.main: Passenger Plane Vanishes in Eastern Indonesia
